multiplechoiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, navigate to the “Immunisation maps” dashboard. Find the map “EPI - DPT 1-3 dropout rate by district” and use the context menu to open it in the Maps app. Reorder the layer cards to make the thematic layer the top layer card.

label.h3: When the layer cards are reordered, what happens to the district names seen within the map?

choicegroup.choice: The district names become visible and you are able to easily read them within the map
The district names fade into the background and become difficult to read
There is no noticeable change when the layer cards are reordered

div.p: You can reorder layer cards by clicking on the 6-dots icon in the upper left-hand corner of the layer card, and dragging and dropping it to the desired position. In this example, when the boundary layer is placed below the thematic layer, the district names fade into the background and become difficult to read. To easily view the district names, the boundary layer needs to be the top layer card (above the thematic layer).
